00020 //! construct an empty column vector
00021 template<typename eT>
00022 inline
00023 basic_colvec<eT>::basic_colvec()
00024   : basic_mat<eT>()
00025   {
00026   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00027   }
00028 
00029 
00030 
00031 //! construct a column vector with the specified number of n_elem
00032 template<typename eT>
00033 inline
00034 basic_colvec<eT>::basic_colvec(const u32 in_n_elem)
00035   : basic_mat<eT>(in_n_elem,1)
00036   {
00037   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00038   }
00039 
00040 
00041 
00042 //! construct a column vector from specified text
00043 template<typename eT>
00044 inline
00045 basic_colvec<eT>::basic_colvec(const char* text)
00046   : basic_mat<eT>(text)
00047   {
00048   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00049   
00050   std::swap( access::rw(basic_mat<eT>::n_rows), access::rw(basic_mat<eT>::n_cols) );
00051   arma_debug_check( (basic_mat<eT>::n_cols > 1), "basic_colvec(): incompatible dimensions" );
00052   }
00053 
00054 
00055 
00056 //! construct a column vector from specified text
00057 template<typename eT>
00058 inline
00059 const basic_colvec<eT>&
00060 basic_colvec<eT>::operator=(const char* text)
00061   {
00062   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00063   
00064   basic_mat<eT>::operator=(text);
00065   std::swap( access::rw(basic_mat<eT>::n_rows), access::rw(basic_mat<eT>::n_cols) );
00066   arma_debug_check( (basic_mat<eT>::n_cols > 1), "basic_colvec(): incompatible dimensions" );
00067   
00068   return *this;
00069   }

00141 
00142 //! construct a column vector from a given auxillary array of eTs
00143 template<typename eT>
00144 inline
00145 basic_colvec<eT>::basic_colvec(const eT* aux_mem, const u32 aux_length)
00146   {
00147   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00148   
00149   set_size(aux_length, 1);
00150 
00151   arma_check( (basic_mat<eT>::n_elem != aux_length), "basic_colvec::basic_colvec(): don't know how to handle the given array" );
00152 
00153   syslib::copy_elem( basic_mat<eT>::memptr(), aux_mem, basic_mat<eT>::n_elem );
00154   }

00158 template<typename eT>
00159 template<typename T1, typename T2>
00160 inline
00161 basic_colvec<eT>::basic_colvec
00162   (
00163   const arma_base<typename basic_colvec<eT>::pod_type, T1>& A,
00164   const arma_base<typename basic_colvec<eT>::pod_type, T2>& B
00165   )
00166   : basic_mat<eT>(A,B)
00167   {
00168   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00169   
00170   arma_debug_check( (basic_mat<eT>::n_cols > 1), "basic_colvec(): incompatible dimensions" );
00171   }

00261 //! construct a column vector from op_data, i.e. run the previously delayed operations; the result of the operations must have exactly one column
00262 template<typename eT>
00263 template<typename T1, typename op_type>
00264 inline
00265 basic_colvec<eT>::basic_colvec(const op_data<T1, op_type>& X)
00266   : basic_mat<eT>(X)
00267   {
00268   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00269   
00270   arma_debug_check( (basic_mat<eT>::n_cols > 1), "basic_colvec(): incompatible dimensions" );
00271   }
00272 
00273 
00274 
00275 //! construct a column vector from op_data, i.e. run the previously delayed operations; the result of the operations must have exactly one column
00276 template<typename eT>
00277 template<typename T1, typename op_type>
00278 inline
00279 const basic_colvec<eT>&
00280 basic_colvec<eT>::operator=(const op_data<T1, op_type>& X)
00281   {
00282   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00283   
00284   basic_mat<eT>::operator=(X);
00285   arma_debug_check( (basic_mat<eT>::n_cols > 1), "basic_colvec::operator=(): given matrix can't be interpreted as a column vector" );
00286   return *this;
00287   }

00353 //! change the number of n_rows
00354 template<typename eT>
00355 inline
00356 void
00357 basic_colvec<eT>::set_size(const u32 in_n_elem)
00358   {
00359   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00360   
00361   basic_mat<eT>::set_size(in_n_elem,1);
00362   }
00363 
00364 
00365 
00366 //! change the number of n_rows  (this function re-implements mat::set_size() in order to check the number of columns)
00367 template<typename eT>
00368 inline
00369 void
00370 basic_colvec<eT>::set_size(const u32 in_n_rows, const u32 in_n_cols)
00371   {
00372   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00373   
00374   basic_mat<eT>::set_size( in_n_rows, (std::min)( u32(1), in_n_cols ) );
00375   arma_debug_check( (in_n_cols > 1), "basic_colvec::set_size(): incompatible dimensions" );
00376   }

00381 inline
00382 void
00383 basic_colvec<eT>::zeros()

00402 
00403 
00404 template<typename eT>
00405 inline
00406 void
00407 basic_colvec<eT>::zeros(const u32 in_n_rows, const u32 in_n_cols)
00408   {
00409   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00410   
00411   basic_mat<eT>::zeros( in_n_rows, (std::min)( u32(1), in_n_cols ) );
00412   arma_debug_check( (in_n_cols > 1), "basic_colvec::zeros(): incompatible dimensions" );
00413   }

00417 template<typename eT>
00418 inline
00419 void
00420 basic_colvec<eT>::load(const std::string name, const file_type type)
00421   {
00422   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00423   
00424   basic_mat<eT>::load(name,type);
00425   arma_debug_check( (basic_mat<eT>::n_cols > 1), "basic_colvec(): incompatible dimensions" );
00426   }
